items.title: Fed Chair Powell says inflation, hiring slowdown pose 'challenging situation'
items.description: Eight months have elapsed since the Fed last adjusted interest rates.

items.title: FBI searching former Trump adviser John Bolton's home
items.description: Federal agents were seen Friday morning searching the Maryland residence of former Trump national security adviser John Bolton, ABC News has learned.

items.title: WATCH:  President Trump visits police and military in DC as he touts anti-crime push
items.description: D.C., on Thursday to oversee the surge in federal law enforcement and National Guard responding to what he says is a crime emergency.

items.title: WATCH:  'Wet Wipe Island' clogs up area along River Thames

items.title: Funeral home owner who stashed decaying bodies set to be sentenced for corpse abuse
items.description: Two years after piles of decaying bodies were found in a rural Colorado building, a funeral home owner is set to be sentenced for 191 counts of corpse...
